title: Daily Total Snow (Liquid-Equivalent)

aggregation.note: Snow shown is LIQUID-EQUIVALENT (LES/LE). Accumulation intervals are split across local calendar days by overlap.

cap_note: Color scale capped at 2.00" LE (values above shown as top color).
style_note: PowerNorm gamma=1.6 to reduce low-end drama.
threshold_note: Values below 0.01" LE are treated as 'no measurable snow' and rendered blank.
